BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.test.loader.AbstractTestParameterLoader.load(URI, URI, String, String) checks a map with containsKey(), before using get()
This web server request could be used by an attacker to expose internal services and filesystem.
This web server request could be used by an attacker to expose internal services and filesystem.
This API (java/nio/file/Paths.get(Ljava/net/URI;)Ljava/nio/file/Path;) reads a file whose location might be specified by user input
